name: .HTX File Extension
summary: Learn about .HTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: HTML document that uses the Microsoft Indexing Service; contains code that defines how results from a database should be displayed within a Web page; often created with Microsoft FrontPage Web development software.

content: HTX files should be saved in the same directory as the corresponding Internet Database Connector (.IDC) file. They will only be processed by a Web server that supports Microsoft Indexing Service.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
